subject: Re: Simsonn Collaboration Invitation: Review the Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hi there,

Is there a contact currently?
Lilian seems to be not answering

Best Regards

On Fri, Sep 5, 2025 at 2:38 AM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Hello,
>
> I’m the Product Manager at Simsonn. We’ve seen your objective and
> impressive reviews of various sim racing equipment on YouTube, and we were
> very impressed.
>
> The influence of the Simsonn brand is growing rapidly, and our potential
> customers are eager to see more authentic feedback from professional sim
> racers. We believe that your review would not only help us promote our
> products more effectively, but also bring you greater audience engagement
> and revenue opportunities. This could be a meaningful collaboration for
> both of us.
>
> We would like to sincerely invite you to review our latest product, the
> Simsonn Plus X Pedals. If you are interested, we will be happy to provide
> the product to you free of charge. You can choose the model you prefer and
> create a detailed and objective review video.
> Here’s the product link:
> https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
>
> In addition, through our affiliate program you can earn 8% commission (up
> to 15%) on sales generated via your content. Please see the details here:
> http://simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program
>
> Thank you for taking the time to consider our collaboration offer. We have
> full confidence in your professionalism and are looking forward to your
> reply. If you are interested, we would be glad to discuss the next steps
> with you.
>
> Best regards,
> The Simsonn Team
>
> ------------------------------
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Random CallSign,  Hello, may I ask if you’ve encountered any issues? If you have any requests or ideas regarding product reviews/testing, please feel free to let me know.

Hi there

I'm trying to contact someone on your side about a possible product review
and another issue as well. Lillian doesn't seem to answer emails anymore
and I don't have any other contacts. So

I have reviewed the PlusX and would like to review the ProX.

Best regards
Hi Random CallSign,  Can you review our Amazon link? And could you please provide us your shipping address? Which model do you want? Pro X Ultra P3-H3 or Pro X Ultra P3-H3-Plate?

All the bells and whistles.

Also, I have quite a large sum in the affiliate account. How can I make an
withdrawal there?

Best regards
Hi Random CallSign,       Could you please send me a screenshot? Our commission payouts are processed with a one-month delay, so the commission for October will be settled in December.

Hi there,

From September to October this is the sinppet

this is the total paid

Can you progress this?
Thank you

------------------------------
*

Hi,

Any update to this?

Best Regards

------------------------------
*

Hi Random CallSign,  We have already started compiling the information. As it is currently the peak season with a high volume of shipments and emails, there has been some delay in processing. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi there,

Thanks for that. Yesterday I did recieve a payment.


However I believe this is not correct, or something happened

Goaff has 0 payment made


The November comissions are as such


The previous months are still outstanding and up to Novemeber comission
payments should account to

Best Regards
------------------------------
*

Hi Random CallSign,    This is the commission for November. We will pay the commission for December in early February. Due to our 30-day return policy, commissions are paid one month later. We appreciate your understanding.

Hi there, sure. But that doesnt really answer my questions.
The November payout is not correct, as it should be the value Ive mentioned
of 749USD. The Payouts for October and September have not been processed.
The goaff payout is still sitting at 0$ payout too.

Can you please go over this one with some attention as the payouts are
delayed by months?

Best Regards and thank you for your attention.

------------------------------
*
Hi Random CallSign,    We have already paid the commission for the period prior to the 11th. Please confirm.

Hi there,

OK Ive checked the payments, the payment for Sep/Oct is there.
The November payment it isnt correct as it totals 749USD.

Can you update the goaffiliate page to show the payments made?

Thank you.

Best Regards

------------------------------
*
Hi Random CallSign,     Yes, I see you've met the incentive requirements for November. We'll process your payment.
